SELECT CT.TITLE, CT."START", CT."END", CT.CAL_NUM , MT.EMAIL, MT.NICKNAME, TT.TASK, TT.IS_DONE, CT.CATE FROM CALENDAR_TEST CT INNER JOIN MEMBER_TEST MT ON CT.FK_EMAIL = MT.EMAIL INNER JOIN TODO_TEST TT ON CT.CAL_NUM = TT.CALENDAR_NUM

SELECT MAX(CT.TITLE) AS TITLE, MAX(CT."START") AS "START", MAX(CT."END") AS "END", CT.CAL_NUM, MAX(MT.EMAIL) AS EMAIL, MAX(MT.NICKNAME) AS NICKNAME, MAX(TT.TASK) AS TASK, MAX(TT.IS_DONE) AS IS_DONE, MAX(CT.CATE) AS CATE FROM CALENDAR_TEST CT INNER JOIN MEMBER_TEST MT ON CT.FK_EMAIL = MT.EMAIL INNER JOIN TODO_TEST TT ON CT.CAL_NUM = TT.CALENDAR_NUM GROUP BY CT.CAL_NUM
mapper.update: UPDATE TODO_TEST SET IS_DONE = #{isChecked} WHERE CALENDAR_NUM = #{calendarNum}
